code:
stateDiagram-v2

    state ForkState <<fork>>
    state JoinState <<join>>

    GUIProcess: Process for displaying
 GUI is started
    GUIInit: GUI initializes data interface
 and components
    GUI: GUI is opened and shows
 list of stocks
    ReadData: Data interface reads
 relevant pickle file
    StockHandled: The data for the stock
 has been updated
    FindStock: Find stock with mising data
    DataGathererProcess: Process for gathering
 data is started
    WriteData: Data is written to
 pickle file
    DataGatherer: DataGatherer scrapes
 webpages
    GatherData: Stock data is gathered

    [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] --> ForkState: Program is started
    ForkState --> GUIProcess
    ForkState --> DataGathererProcess
    GUIProcess --> JoinState
    DataGathererProcess --> GatherData
    GatherData --> WriteData
    WriteData --> JoinState
    JoinState --> GUIInit: Data exists in file
    GUIInit --> ReadData: GUI requests data
    ReadData --> GUI: Data interface returns data
    GUI --> UpdateData: Every 500ms
    GUI --> RefreshData: User requests data
 to be updated
    GUI --> FilterData: User creates a filter
    GUI --> SortData: User requests data
 to be sorted
    GUI --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]: User closes GUI
    StockHandled --> GUI: Tell the GUI that new
 data is available
    RefreshButton --> GUI: Data interface
 returns data
    Filter --> GUI: Data interface
 returns data
    Sort --> GUI: Data interface
 returns data

    state RefreshData {HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] --> RefreshButton
    }

    state SortData {HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> Sort: Send column and sort direction
 to data interface
    }

    state FilterData {HealthTech_PatientRecords] --> Filter: Send filter type to
 data interface
    }

    state UpdateData {HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> FindStock
        FindStock --> [HealthTech_PatientRecords]: No stock found
        FindStock --> DataGatherer: Send stock to data
 gathering process
        DataGatherer --> StockHandled
    }
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
